right.text: The International Alliance for Cancer Early Detection unites world leading researchers to tackle the biggest challenges in early detection, an important area of unmet clinical need. ACED Scientists work together at the forefront of technological innovation to translate research into realistic improvements in cancer diagnosis, which can be implemented into health systems and meaningfully benefit people at risk of cancer.

This Integrated Data Platform (IDP) provides a universal and secure environment for ACED researchers to share essential research data between member centers, enabling novel insights from Alliance sponsored research.
